I spent too much RP
I haven't been on till yesterday, can someone tell me how this works? (Been gone for 3 months) D":

You can get 3 PROJECT Icons with Caches at 750 IP each (2250 total).  Each of these will have a Summoner Icon, an Augment Cache Fragment, 2 PROJECT Cores, and the First Strike Blueprint (which unlocks the First Strike border for a Project Skin - Ashe, Katarina, or Ekko).  Additional Caches can be bought for RP.

You'll end up having 3 First Strike Blueprints, 6 Cores, and 3 Cache Fragments from these.  The 3 Cache Fragments combine to make an Augment Cache, which will have a skin shard and some other loot, and may have another Augment Cache Fragment.

After getting these, get the Disruption Cache for 1500 IP, which will have 7 Cores, a PROJECT: Overdrive Blueprint, and 2 Augment Cache fragments (iirc).

You should have at least 13 Cores total, plus the rest of the loot.  Using 7 PROJECT Cores, you can craft the First Strike border for the Ashe, Ekko, or Katarina PROJECT skins if you own the skin.  Or, you can use 12 cores to craft a PROJECT: Overdrive (Yasuo, Yi, Zed, Fiora, Lucian, or Leona) skin shard from the Blueprint, which you can then unlock using Hextech Crafting.

I done messed up then, got the 3 caches (I did not have RP so used IP) and got all open, got the 5 cores and was sad that i couldn't get a border, dident know about the 4 box until today :_;

> [{quoted}](name=Kairoptra,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=tY12TY3y,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2016-08-15T20:13:29.187+0000)
>
> This has nothing to do with this post but I thought I'd share: Zilean's name is a misspelling of the non-existent number, a zillion, as in a zillion years. Just now thought of that. Somebody tell me if I'm wrong with that theory or if I'm late to the party.

You are wrong. Zilean was the SN of one of the original developers of Dota-that-became-League, along with Ryze and Ezreal. They naturally made and named characters after themselves. Zilean (the human) was notorious for saying that he thought it was stupid that anyone would consider a bear character for their game, and would do all in his power to combat an absurd idea. This is why Zilean (champ) has that easter egg buff for Volibear.
What buff go on!!!!{{summoner:6}} {{summoner:6}} {{champion:53}}

> [{quoted}](name=URFinyourmomseye,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=tY12TY3y,comment-id=000a00000000,timestamp=2016-08-15T22:17:45.773+0000)
>
> What buff go on!!!!{{summoner:6}} {{summoner:6}} {{champion:53}}

It's not a buff that does anything, just a vanity buff that tracks your kills of Volibear. He gets a version to track Zilean kills too.

Actually extra gold is granted upon kills to one another, Voli gets an extra 11 and Zilean gets an extra 10.

(also the developer's name was Zileas)
(and it wasn't dota it was WoW)
(memes)
By the way, that buff isn't actually in the game anymore. They removed all the "fun" buffs quite some time ago because they just confuse new players.

Unfortunately, you just got unlucky. Some people got an Augment Cache Fragment with their free Augment Cache, and therefore got fourteen total PROJECT Cores over the course of the event, allowing them to get two PROJECT icons.

So I just want to make sure I understand. You have to unlock the icon AND buy the skin before the event is over to actually get the loading screen cards? I've finished all the icons but I don't want to buy the skins yet. Buying the skin at a later date wont unlock me the load screen?

The way I read it was you have to unlock BOTH before the event ends in order to get the border. Taken from the FAQ:

"Forge together an Icon Blueprint and 7 PROJECT cores. **Own a First Strike icon and its corresponding PROJECT skin by the end of the event** to unlock a permanent First Strike loading screen border for that skin."

[Link to the FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ)
